opensiddur/opensiddur.name: opensiddur/opensiddur
opensiddur/opensiddur.desc: The Open Siddur Project aims to produce a free software toolkit for making high-quality custom Jewish liturgical books such as haggadot, siddurim, and bentchers that can be displayed on screen or printed to paper. The project's goals include producing a reliable source text, enabling personalization and customization of the text for local rites and customs and selective inclusion of multilingual translations, transliterations, instructions, notes, and commentaries.

ordinarymiddleclass/omcdiary.name: ordinarymiddleclass/omcdiary
ordinarymiddleclass/omcdiary.desc: 這個repository是放蒼白球日誌(即蒼白無味的中產階級日記)的地方。不是底層，亦非富貴，無社會歷練，不知人間疾苦。但這樣沒有意義的我還是想要寫些什麼。願意聽這樣蒼白的日記嗎？那麼請進。

OBVIL/historiographie-theatre.name: OBVIL/historiographie-theatre
OBVIL/historiographie-theatre.desc: Le projet vise à l’étude des éléments qui constituent l’émergence au XVIIIe siècle d’une historiographie théâtrale comparée autonome par rapport à l’historiographie littéraire et à l’identification des stratégies conceptuelles et historiographiques qui fondent la naissance d’une analyse moderne de la dramaturgie et de l’histoire du théâtre européens.
